Replace.Text: After completing the foreign trade municipality, each city will have +1 [ICON_TradeRoute] trade route capacity; international [ICON_TradeRoute] trade routes will receive an additional +2 [ICON_Food] food, +2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity, and +2 [ICON_Gold] gold coins.

[ICON_TradeRoute] Trade route immune to raiding and international [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade route output +100%; +1 per luxury resource developed [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade route capacity; international [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade route destination +2 per luxury resource [ICON_Food] Food, +2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Productivity, +2 [ICON_SCIENCE] Technology, +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, +2 [ICON_FAITH] Faith, +3 [ICON_Gold] gold; can produce units regardless of resource requirements

The characteristic building of the Holy Trinity; provides +3 [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity, +3 [ICON_SCIENCE] technology value, +3 [ICON_CULTURE] culture value, +3 [ICON_FAITH] faith value; each luxury improvement in this city has an additional +1 [ ICON_PRODUCTION] Productivity, +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture Value, +1 [ICON_FAITH] Faith Value, +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold Coin, additional +2 [ICON_SCIENCE] Technology Value, +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Productivity, +1 for each strategic resource improvement [ICON_Food] Food, +1 [ICON_Gold] gold, additional +1 per bonus resource improvement [ICON_PRODUCTION] Productivity, +1 [ICON_Food] Food

The special reconnaissance unit of the Holy Trinity, instead of the scout, gains +100% experience. When looting, it obtains [ICON_SCIENCE] technology value, [ICON_CULTURE] culture value, [ICON_FAITH] faith value, and [ICON_Gold] gold coin equal to the current round number * 3. , with stronger mobility and wider field of vision, and a unique upgrade tree
Holy Trinity Comprehensive College in Kivotos

One of the three major colleges in Kivotos, its council is called "Tea Party". There are many societies such as the vigilante group, the Ministry of Justice Realization, and the Rescue Knights. Generally speaking, discipline and culture are valued. Most of the students are honest and kind, giving people the impression of young ladies who are not familiar with the world. The internal security situation is orderly and stable. Of course, Trinity isn't perfect. In the calm college atmosphere, there are many problems hidden.

He is the leader of "Filius", the student alliance that forms Holy Trinity, and is also the host of the "Tea Party" of the student union. His words are plain and elegant, but he never reveals his true thoughts, so he is considered a difficult and mysterious figure. Her hobby was preparing tea and snacks for tea parties. Many Trinity students dreamed of being invited to tea parties by her.

The characteristic building of the Holy Trinity; provides +3 [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity, +3 [ICON_SCIENCE] technology value, +3 [ICON_CULTURE] culture value, +3 [ICON_FAITH] faith value; each luxury improvement in this city has an additional +1 [ ICON_PRODUCTION] Productivity, +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture Value, +1 [ICON_FAITH] Faith Value, +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold Coin, additional +2 [ICON_SCIENCE] Technology Value, +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Productivity, +1 for each strategic resource improvement [ICON_Food] Food, +1 [ICON_Gold] gold, additional +1 per bonus resource improvement [ICON_PRODUCTION] Productivity, +1 [ICON_Food] Food
